name: Starting Out
description:
Play at 1920x1080!

Play as a struggling artist who just lost her part-time job and is forced to resort to selling her art online to pay for her bills at the end of the week. 

Balance your on-hand cash and art supplies to pay for her livelihood, as every in-game day changes what is popular online, and the prices you can sell them more varies in turn!

This game is without sound for now, as everything was purposely made entirely by me, art included. Will likely add SFX down the line.
